backend/main.mo: Motoko backend defining salon, booking, user profile types, plus seeded Swiss salon data and storage/authorization mixins.
feature_evidence.json: JSON report listing feature requirements, affected files, and component dependencies for AppV1.jsx replacement and compileâ€‘fix tasks.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Reference file providing short textual summaries for major frontend components and hooks.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base/theme variables and color system with light/dark modes and global style rules.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry point mounting the React app with main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component that simply renders AppV1.
frontend/src/AppV1.jsx: Large standalone UI implementing the V60 Nexus Divine experience with hardcoded data, luxury styling, and salon detail interactions.
frontend/src/components/AuthHeader.tsx: Empty placeholder file for AuthHeader component.

frontend/src/components/Pressable.tsx: Empty placeholder file for Pressable component.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Empty placeholder file for ProfileSetupModal component.

frontend/src/components/ProStudioCreator: Empty placeholder file for ProStudioCreator component.
frontend/src/components/RevenueChart.tsx: Empty placeholder file for RevenueChart component.

frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Hook creating and caching the backend actor, refreshing queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks managing Internet Identity login, persistence, and status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Empty placeholder file for backend query hooks.
frontend/src/hooks/useSalonImage.ts: Empty placeholder file for salon image handling hook.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, light/dark theme CSS variables, base styles, and custom animation keyframes/classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and InternetIdentityProvider, then renders App.
frontend/src/utils/auraGenerator.ts: Generates marketing-style aura text from salon form data using predefined category, type, and tag modifiers.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading, storing, and clearing URL parameters with sessionStorage fallback.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom OKLCH color variables, animations, container settings, and plugins.
project_state.json: Contains project metadata, version notes, architectural directions, and known issues for ongoing frontend/back-end resets.
